markdownRemark.html:
In this post I want to dissect a paper’s style and try to criticize it irregardless of it’s content. The paper is the one mentioned in the previous post:

Sean J. Taylor & Benjamin Letham (2018) “Forecasting at Scale”, The American Statistician.

What makes it good?

organization, wording

What makes it bad?
